choices.A: The BJP incorporated several leaders from other parties in an attempt to strengthen their position in the 2024 Lok Sabha elections in Uttar Pradesh.
choices.B: U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo led a high-level trade and investment delegation to the Philippines, announcing over $1 billion in investments.
choices.C: The crew of the MV Tutor was evacuated after the vessel was struck by a sea drone and an aerial projectile by Yemen's Huthi rebels.
choices.D: The Philippine military denied Chinese allegations that Filipino troops pointed guns at China's coastguard during a confrontation at Second Thomas Shoal.
